Document Retention Requirement for Scanned Documents
PMC Capture Units must retain all paper documents scanned intoÂ FFR
that meet the criteria for destruction
for 90 days, after which they will be destroyed, according to the guidance contained in
M21-1, Part I, Subpart ii, 1.C.3.a
.
title: M21-1, Part I, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section C - Pension Management Center (PMC) Procedures
